_sText: This is a pro version of the surf_mai collection with a touch of surf_mai_remix and design inspiration of Buck Nastys maps. Please note that this is only a BETA and I know that there are some bugs in this map. I'm uploading this now as I wanted to finish this map in near future. For that I need some more testers, helping me to find bugs and improving my map. Any constructive feedback is welcome, excluding that the design is copied from BuckNasty. At this point I need to say that I've already talked to Buck Nasty about the design sheme and it's textures. He helped me finding a new collection (thanks for that) which I didn't use in this version yet . So don't worry, it's gonna be changed on further versions. Thanks to everyone who helped me with this map yet. +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Known Bugs: - On the big half-cicled ramp you get stack sometimes but mostely it will work fine. (Most annoying) - Some spotlights, spawning under water, have some strange lighting errors. - Sometimes you don't get a knife, if you fell down into jail. - You can walk in the middle of the spawn (the wall) tought there are 2 trigger_pushes in 2 different directions (like one to the left, one to the right, if you stand in the middle you won't be pushed anywhere). - In the middle of the map, on the round platform, the push sometimes doesn't push you far enough (to jail). +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ This is a fast map with all its boosters and fast weapon spawners without pressing buttons anymore. Also you don't need to wait for somebody to help you, if you fall to jail, anymore, as you can simply walk away - but without weapons. All ramps are smooth and can be surfed from both sides. Buyzone and "secret" shotgun are still included. The bomb-target activates itself after 60 seconds. Have fun with it and please post as much feedback as possible, whatever is in your mind. Cheers, Krusty
